name: RoomskillsVoicecontrol,tellyourrooms
0: ”Alexa, tell home control turn ceiling light on”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home control
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill adds voice control to the Roomskills service.

The skill requires an account on Roomskills.com and needs the devices being already set-up on Roomskills.com .

Detailed instructions on how to set up the service can be found on the Roomskills.com web site under Products Voicecontrol.

After the setup some simple commands can be used to control the devices like
- Alexa, tell home control play music from Michael Jackson in the living room
- Alexa, tell home control turn the light off in the kitchen

A standard room can be defined for each Echo device so the Echo in the dining room can be adressed by 

- Alexa, tell home control play music from michael jackson 

to play the right music in the dining room right away.
